statements: SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE setting_key = 'difficulty';
SELECT player_id, setting_key FROM game_settings WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT setting_key, setting_value FROM game_settings WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE player_id = 3 AND setting_key = 'sound';
SELECT player_id, setting_value FROM game_settings WHERE setting_key = 'color';
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT setting_value, setting_key FROM game_settings WHERE setting_key LIKE 'theme%';
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM game_settings WHERE setting_value = 'enabled';
SELECT setting_key, COUNT(*) AS count FROM game_settings GROUP BY setting_key HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT player_id, setting_key, setting_value FROM game_settings ORDER BY player_id ASC, setting_key DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_settings;
SELECT * FROM player_settings WHERE sound_volume > 50;
SELECT player_id, theme, difficulty_level FROM game_preferences WHERE difficulty_level <= 3;
SELECT player_name, sound_volume, music_volume FROM player_settings WHERE player_id = 101;
SELECT player_id, max_score, theme FROM game_preferences WHERE max_score >= 1000;
SELECT player_name, sound_volume, music_volume FROM player_settings WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_settings ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT theme, difficulty_level FROM game_preferences WHERE max_score > 1000;
SELECT player_name, theme, difficulty_level, max_score FROM player_settings JOIN game_preferences ON player_settings.player_id = game_preferences.player_id;
SELECT player_name, sound_volume, music_volume FROM player_settings WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND sound_volume > 50 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, sound_volume, music_volume FROM game_settings;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, language FROM player_preferences WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT total_score, level FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, theme FROM player_preferences ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, sound_volume, music_volume FROM game_settings
SELECT username, language, theme FROM player_preferences
SELECT player_id, level, total_score FROM player_stats
SELECT player_id, level, total_score FROM player_stats ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE language='EN'
SELECT * FROM game_settings;
SELECT player_name, sound_volume, music_volume FROM game_settings;
SELECT player_name, total_score, highest_level_completed FROM game_settings JOIN player_statistics USING (player_id);
SELECT player_name, game_difficulty, theme_color FROM game_settings JOIN player_preferences USING (player_id);
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM game_settings JOIN player_inventory USING (player_id);
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM game_settings INNER JOIN player_statistics ON game_settings.player_id = player_statistics.player_id
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE game_difficulty = 'Hard' AND language = 'English'
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM game_settings JOIN player_inventory ON game_settings.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT player_name, total_score, games_played FROM game_settings JOIN player_statistics ON game_settings.player_id = player_statistics.player_id WHERE games_played > 50 ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT player_id, theme_color FROM player_preferences WHERE theme_color = 'Blue'
SELECT * FROM PlayerPreferences;
SELECT player_id, display_name, sound_volume FROM PlayerPreferences WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM Achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT game_id, graphics_quality, control_scheme FROM GameSettings WHERE difficulty_level = 'Medium';
SELECT player_id, item_id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT display_name, sound_volume, music_volume FROM PlayerPreferences ORDER BY display_name DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM Achievements WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT game_id, difficulty_level, graphics_quality FROM GameSettings WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard';
SELECT save_name, save_data FROM SavedGames WHERE player_id = 10 AND save_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_id = 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
